item.description:
Our Maltese Meet this month will take place the FIRST Sunday of the month, August 7th.

We will meet again from 1pm to 4pm at Especially for Pets in Sudbury. They do have air conditioning! And it is a safe and friendly place.

Yesterday's July Meet drew the biggest attendance we've had yet!

Email me at laptopmaltese@aol.com,
and tell me what kinds of refreshments/food you'd like to see at the next Maltese Meet.

For the August 7th Meet, please let me know as soon as you can whether or not you can come.

Thanks!

Maltese best,
Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Maltese August Meetup
